synopsis.text:
Naruko Shoukichi, Imaizumi Shunsuke, and Onoda Sakamichi, three passionate cyclists from Sohoku High School, take center stage in "Yowamushi Pedal: Re:RIDE." This thrilling anime film masterfully condenses the first half of the Inter High arc from the inaugural television season, interspersing the original narrative with enticing snippets of never-before-seen footage.

Join the trio as they reminisce about their shared journey at Toudou's family inn, where friendships were forged, and challenges were overcome. Initially, Onoda, a self-confessed anime enthusiast and a somewhat introverted first-year student, aspired to be a part of the anime research club. However, a fateful encounter with Imaizumi, a celebrated cyclist since his middle school days, and Naruko, the reigning champion of the Kansai cycling tournament, propelled Onoda into the adrenaline-fueled world of competitive cycling.

Prepare to be captivated by the exhilarating exploits of these young athletes as they navigate the demanding terrain of high school cycling. "Yowamushi Pedal: Re:RIDE" serves as the perfect prelude to "Yowamushi Pedal Grande Road," rekindling your love for the series and stoking your anticipation for the adventures yet to unfold.
